M:MilitiaDataParsing.IParsable.Parsing(MilitiaDataParsing.Parser)
member.summary: Called when importing or exporting and is used connect all fields or properties with their specified keys. Not intended to be called manually.
member.param: Parser containing methods for parsing values.

member.summary: Indicates that the parser is currently exporting data.
